metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0896 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in eXtplorer before 2.1.7 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0896` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

extplorer - 2.1.0b6+dfsg.3-4+deb7u3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: extplorer package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.0b6+dfsg.3-4+deb7u3ubuntu0.1').
